docs.text: Welcome to MkLorum For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Inventario de Hardware Existen 10 racks en la sala de datos, cada uno con 15 servidores Especificaciones de los rack Tipo gabinete cerrado NO SON de montaje en pared 25U de altura (120,0 cm) https://www.startech.com/es-es/gestion-de-servidores/rk2537bkm Especificaciones de los servidores: 1U https://www.dell.com/es-es/work/shop/povw/poweredge-r6525
